subSections.title: Readings
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der2|lang=ja
|{{ja-r|裏%切り者|うら%ぎりもの}}: [[traitor]]; [[betrayer]]; [[turncoat]]
|{{ja-r|臆%病%者|おく%びょう%もの}}: [[coward]]
|{{ja-r|人%気%者|にん%き%もの}}: [[popular]] person
|{{ja-r|若%者|わか%もの}}: [[youth]]; [[youngster]]
|{{ja-r|悪%者|わる%もの}}: [[rascal]], [[bad]] [[fellow]]
}}

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|しゃ|suffix}}

# [[someone]] of that [[type]], someone who does [[that]]

subSections.text:
{{der2|lang=ja
|{{ja-r|愛国者|あいこくしゃ}}: [[patriot]]
|{{ja-r|愛読者|あいどくしゃ}}: [[avid]] [[reader]], [[book]] [[lover]]

|{{ja-r|患者|かんじゃ}}: [[patient]]
|{{ja-r|学者|がくしゃ}}: [[scholar]]
|{{ja-r|記者|きしゃ}}: [[reporter]]; [[journalist]]
|{{ja-r|芸者|げいしゃ}}, {{ja-r|芸者|げいじゃ}}: [[geisha]]
|{{ja-r|作者|さくしゃ}}: [[author]]; [[creator]] of a [[work]]
|{{ja-r|新聞記者|しんぶん きしゃ}}: [[journalist]]
|{{ja-r|担当者|たんとうしゃ}}: person [[in charge]]
|{{ja-r|著者|ちょしゃ}}: [[author]]
|{{ja-r|忍者|にんじゃ}}: [[ninja]]
|{{ja-r|配偶者|はいぐうしゃ}}: [[spouse]]
|{{ja-r|歯医者|はいしゃ}}: [[dentist]]
|{{ja-r|被害者|ひがいしゃ}}: [[victim]]
|{{ja-r|利用者|りようしゃ}}: [[consumer]]
}}
